titleStmt.title: The humble address of the VVidow VVhitrowe to King William with a faithful warning to the inhabitants of England to haste and prepare by true repentance and deep humiliation to meet the Lord, before his indignation burns like fire and breaks forth into a mighty flame so that none can quench it.
titleStmt.author: Whitrowe, Joan.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
